description: The procurement is for [ delivery and/or installation ] of office chairs. The commodities subject to the newly proposed procurement are listed as
full_summary:
### Government Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)
#### Purchasing Office Chairs
**Notice Number:** cb-317-90396184
**Public Release Date:** January 16, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** January 25, 2024, 12:00 PM PST

**Procurement Overview**
The Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada department is seeking suppliers to provide office chairs as per the Supplies Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/H under the product sub-category 56101720 (Office or work chairs).

**Objectives**
The supplier shall deliver, install, and provide office chairs to various locations across Canada by March 28, 2024. This invitation is open to Pre-Qualified Suppliers (SA holders) under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

**Procurement Details**
* **Method of Procurement:** Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** Please refer to Tender Description or Tender Documents
* **Regulatory Framework:** Canada is exempt from international trade agreements as per the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) Article 800.
* **Location of Delivery:** Various locations in Canada
* **Language:** Both English and French

**Submission Requirements**
Eligible suppliers must submit their bids through the [Government Electronic Tender Service (GETS)](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders).

**Correspondence**
Inquires regarding this procurement are to be submitted to Melissa Smith at:

* Email: [melissa.smith3@agr.gc.ca](mailto:melissa.smith3@agr.gc.ca)
* Phone: (306) 515-4796
* Address: 300 – 2010 12th Avenue, Regina, SK S4P 0M3

### Related Documents
Two attachments are available for access:
* English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29522/rfp-01r11-24-c076-english.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29522/rfp-01r11-24-c076-english.pdf)
* French: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29522/rfp-01r11-24-c076-french_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files
